data.lyric:
[ti:Spicy (Bonus Track(Explicit))]
[ar:Nas/Fivio Foreign/A$AP Ferg]
[al:King's Disease (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Spicy (Explicit) - Nas/Fivio Foreign/A$AP Ferg
[00:00.75]Lyrics by：Nasir Jones/Maxie Ryles/DAROLD FERGUSON/Derek Milano
[00:01.51]Composed by：Nasir Jones/Maxie Ryles/DAROLD FERGUSON/Derek Milano
[00:02.26]Pricy
[00:10.25]Hit-Boy
[00:10.98]Nas：
[00:11.17]Boss s**t your Lord ship
[00:14.30]N***as talkin' yachts since I'm on s**t
[00:16.66]I used to run the block now I'm corporate
[00:18.70]Corporate
[00:19.29]Hoppin' out you know it's up when the doors lift
[00:22.31]Whole squad hide the burners
[00:24.00]Whole squad
[00:24.56]Mets hats in the sky like Bobby Shmurda
[00:26.66]They watch me like a chick courtside as the rocker
[00:29.23]Flow only getting tougher she beggin' me to cuff her
[00:32.04]Brooklyn sweet chick waffles with raspberry butter
[00:34.54]Wear a mink at the roller rink middle of the summer
[00:37.18]If I can't get it done I got soliders with me to cover
[00:39.90]Queens get the money we only stackin' it upwards
[00:42.63]Cheese stay icy 'cause s**t get spicy
[00:45.74]She on Demon time I get her a timepiece
[00:48.22]Patek n***as not lit not like me
[00:50.67]Can't get nothin' by me my mind is 2090
[00:53.47]Nas/Fivio Foreign：
[00:53.87]Que Lo Que everybody pricy
[00:56.26]Cost money beat the charge money
[00:58.92]Fast money push to start money
[01:01.55]Lost money Escobar money
[01:03.90]Uh
[01:04.24]Fivio Foreign：
[01:04.61]Little advice
[01:05.36]Little advice
[01:05.83]Always add spicy
[01:06.59]Uh
[01:07.27]Always get the liqour with the ice
[01:09.93]I don't give a f**k if that's his wife
[01:11.92]I could bag any b***h in these old white Nikes
[01:14.46]Uh
[01:14.64]That ain't right if she tell me no I'm gettin' tight
[01:17.42]Every time you saw me I was nice
[01:19.22]Every time I saw you you was light
[01:21.30]You was
[01:21.93]Every b***h you with look like a dyke
[01:24.27]Yeah
[01:24.75]I mean she might
[01:25.89]Might
[01:26.40]Not never be my type nah
[01:28.16]She might never be my type look
[01:30.24]That b***h is trash I only f**k her for the hype
[01:33.57]I only f**k her for the hype look
[01:35.50]Uh
[01:35.83]Nas：
[01:36.40]Que Lo Que everybody pricy
[01:39.05]Cost money beat the charge money
[01:41.58]Fast money push to start money
[01:44.31]Lost money Escobar money
[01:46.36]A$AP Ferg：
[01:46.75]N***as saying Ferg back but I been with the s**ts
[01:49.01]Might make a grill with Tiffanys on my gentleman s**t
[01:51.66]My drill n***as out in Brooklyn and they spinnin' and s**t
[01:54.37]Bumpin Pop out the whip while we sippin' and s**t
[01:56.88]Movie
[01:57.20]Model b***hes depth precise f**k attendance of the flights
[01:59.76]Keep the vision through the lights never blinded by the height
[02:02.49]Keep the Tommy near the belly sincere 'cause I'm hype
[02:05.16]Got a ghetto Naomi Campell designer with the Nikes
[02:07.82]I'm the one talkin' spice twelve year old killers
[02:10.43]With the guns and the knives better run for your life
[02:13.21]Got a queen in Queens and my ex a Puerto Rican spice
[02:15.83]My Harlem b***h doin' time gettin' caught up with the swipes
[02:18.99]Nas：
[02:19.39]Que Lo Que everybody pricy
[02:21.64]Cost money beat the charge money
[02:23.80]Uh
[02:24.20]Fats money push to start money
[02:26.53]Uh
[02:26.88]Lost money Escobar money
[02:29.13]Lil' b***h
[02:29.85]Hit-Boy we got another one
[02:31.58]Pricy
[02:33.99]Nostradamus Fivio
[02:38.36]A$AP Ferg
[02:41.35]Yeah
data.trans:
[ti:Spicy (Bonus Track(Explicit))]
[ar:Nas/Fivio Foreign/A$AP Ferg]
[al:King's Disease (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.75]//
[00:01.50]//
[00:02.26]昂贵
[00:10.25]Hit-Boy制作
[00:10.98]//
[00:11.17]我是大老板 阁下
[00:14.30]自从我发达之后 大家都在谈论游艇
[00:16.66]我曾经在街头奔波 现在我开公司
[00:18.70]开公司
[00:19.29]你知道我坐的车都是豪车
[00:22.31]整个帮派都藏着枪
[00:24.00]整个帮派
[00:24.56]把帽子仍在空中 就像Bobby Shmurda 
[00:26.66]他们就像球场旁的姑娘一样看着我
[00:29.23]音乐越来越好 她求我和她在一起
[00:32.04]布鲁克林的甜美小妞 让人真的难以抗拒
[00:34.54]盛夏时节 在溜冰场穿着貂皮大衣
[00:37.18]我搞不定的事 还有很多兄弟帮我解决
[00:39.90]钞票源源不断 我们的存款越来越多
[00:42.63]始终穿金戴银 因为事业蒸蒸日上
[00:45.74]她开始变得像个魔鬼 我给她买了手表
[00:48.22]百达翡丽 别人都没我这样酷
[00:50.67]谁都别想从我这里夺走什么 我的思维超级前卫
[00:53.47]//
[00:53.87]你好吗 每个人都身价高昂
[00:56.26]成本高 打赢了官司
[00:58.92]挣钱快 轻松挣大钱
[01:01.55]丢了钱 重新挣回来
[01:03.90]//
[01:04.24]//
[01:04.61]一个小建议
[01:05.36]一个小建议
[01:05.83]始终要有范
[01:06.59]//
[01:07.27]喝酒就要加冰
[01:09.93]我不在乎那是不是他老婆
[01:11.92]我可以让任何女人穿上这全白的耐克
[01:14.46]//
[01:14.64]那样不对 如果她拒绝我 那我就要生气了
[01:17.42]每当你看到我 我都很好看
[01:19.22]每当我看到你 你都很失败
[01:21.30]你都是那样
[01:21.93]你身边的每个女人看起来都不喜欢你
[01:24.27]//
[01:24.75]我是说 她可能
[01:25.89]可能
[01:26.40]根本不是我的菜
[01:28.16]她可能永远不会是我的菜
[01:30.24]那个娘们很不行 我和她亲热 只是闹着玩
[01:33.57]我和她亲热 只是闹着玩
[01:35.50]//
[01:35.83]//
[01:36.40]你好吗 每个人都身价高昂
[01:39.05]成本高 打赢了官司
[01:41.58]挣钱快 轻松挣大钱
[01:44.31]丢了钱 重新挣回来
[01:46.36]//
[01:46.75]他们说我很软弱 但我一直都不曾退缩
[01:49.01]可能要穿着蒂凡尼 像个绅士一样 去镶个金牙
[01:51.66]我的兄弟们在布鲁克林 他们都很勇猛
[01:54.37]我们一边开车 一边拔枪朝着窗外射击
[01:56.88]电影一样
[01:57.20]女模特身材很迷人 在飞机上和漂亮妞缠绵
[01:59.76]始终保持卓越的眼光 从来不会被那些虚假的东西蒙蔽双眼
[02:02.49]武器始终放在身边 不能大意 毕竟我很牛气
[02:05.16]找个街头版本的Naomi Campbell 穿着耐克这样的名牌
[02:07.82]我就是敢说敢言的人 十二岁的杀手
[02:10.43]我带着枪 带着刀 你最好赶紧逃命吧
[02:13.21]皇后区有个漂亮的女人 我的前任是波多黎各人
[02:15.83]我在Harlem的女人因为欺诈正在监狱服刑
[02:18.99]//
[02:19.39]你好吗 每个人都身价高昂
[02:21.64]成本高 打赢了官司
[02:23.80]//
[02:24.20]挣钱快 轻松挣大钱
[02:26.53]//
[02:26.88]丢了钱 重新挣回来
[02:29.13]小碧池
[02:29.85]Hit-Boy 我们又制作了一首歌
[02:31.58]昂贵
[02:33.99]占卜师Fivio
[02:38.36]//
